title: Missed fajr due to sleep. What to do?
transcript: waking up after fajar an hour late what should he do you should pray the Sunnah two Rakas make a palma pray the father two rakahs and then you make your earth car he says isn't this too late for that car I've car works from Fajr prayer till the evening then you protected the whole time if you say it at 11 o'clock then before 11 o'clock from fajar till 11 o'clock you're not protected so yes whenever you wake up you say it without any problem
